p: Sequencing was performed by GATC Inc. (Konstanz, Germany) using the oligonucleotide primer MHLacZ-Pro_f ( 5′ ggctcgtatgttgtgtgg 3′). The antibody gene fragments were analysed by using VBASE2 ( http://www.vbase2.org) and Kabat's database of sequences of immunological interest ( www.bioinf.org.uk) as previously described [45], [52].
